comments:
I changed the plugin dependencies in plugin.xml several times because I was 
experiementing with migriation of old plugins. I also checked/unchecked the 
button "runs with platforms prior 3.0" several times.

At some point, Eclipse refused to update my classpath when dependencies were 
changed. I found the following exceptions in the log. After a restart classpath 
is updated correctly when changing dependencies.

plugin project. Not sure if this is really the cause but again, my classpath is 
not updated anymore until I restart Eclipse.

Resolving as wontfix.  The Work in Progress preference page is not for general 
consumption yet.
